name: Real Zombies
description:
Trapped in an alley, surrounded by zombies. How long will you survive? Designed for the new iPhone 5!

Real Zombies is a ultra-realistic zombie game that is easy to pick up and play and will keep you on your toes! Real Zombies introduces a brand new 3D engine capable of amazing lighting and shadow effects never seen before on a mobile device, giving you the ultimate horror experience!

FEATURES:

- Use the gyroscope to aim. Remember to look behind you!

- Tap anywhere to shoot. Shoot as fast as you can tap. Tap with multiple fingers for rapid firing.

- Compete on global leaderboards to survive the zombie onslaught.

- Amazing 3D engine with 4 dynamic lights, all casting realtime shadows.

- Supported devices include iPad 3, iPad 2, iPhone 5, iPhone 4S, iPod Touch 5th Gen. Sorry older devices are not supported!


DEVELOPER NOTES:

- If you only see a black screen it means your device isn't supported. See the supported device list.
